name: CLAUDE.md Doctor
description: Audit your CLAUDE.md files and .claude/rules/ for quality issues, staleness, anti-patterns, and token bloat, then generate a scored health report with severity-rated fixes you can apply interactively.
longDescription: Scans all project instruction files (root CLAUDE.md, package-level overrides, .claude.local.md, and modular rules) to evaluate token efficiency, command accuracy, path validity, frontmatter correctness, and rule modularity. Produces a file-by-file scorecard with critical/warning/low findings, then offers automatic, critical-only, or per-fix approval workflows.
